m_szDocTitle: Merseyside to get 126 electric car charging points - Liverpool Echo
m_szDocSumamry: Merseyside to get 126 electric car charging points  13:13, 2 Aug 2013  Neil Macdonald  Massive infrastructure boost for green cars  A bid to provide electric vehicle charging points across Merseyside has been successful. A total of 126 charging connections will be installed across the region, including rail stations, which it is hoped will encourage people using electric cars to  link  with the  Merseyrail network. The bid, led by Merseytravel, to the Office for Low Emission Vehicles (OLEV) was on behalf of Liverpool, Sefton, Wirral, St Helens, Halton, Knowsley, and Cheshire West and Chester c
